original_title: Sri Lanka bonds open steady, rupee 308.50/310.00 to dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bonds were steady at open, dealers said while the spot US dollar opened higher at 308.50/310.00 rupees.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 14.50/15.00 percent up from 13.60/14.10 from the previous close.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was closed at 14.75//15.50 percent steady from 14.50/15.25 percent from the previous close.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was quoted at 14.75/.25 percent, up from 14.10/14.30 percent from Wednesday.(Colombo/ July 06/2023)
